<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:63.52%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1.78%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:14.44%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000555" name="us-gaap:OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent" contextRef="C_0000817720_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">49.0</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1.78%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:14.44%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000556" name="us-gaap:OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent" contextRef="C_0000817720_20190630" decimals="-5" scale="6">30.3</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
</tr>
</table></div></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-right:13.33%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000338" name="us-gaap:CommitmentsAndContingenciesDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000817720_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">10. Indemnifications and Contingencies</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Indemnifications </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In connection with certain agreements, we are obligated to indemnify the counterparty against third party claims alleging infringement of certain intellectual property rights by us. We have also entered into indemnification agreements with our officers and directors. Maximum potential future payments under these agreements cannot be estimated because these agreements generally do not have a maximum stated liability. However, historical costs related to these indemnification provisions have not been significant. We have not recorded any liability in our condensed consolidated financial statements for such indemnification obligations. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:18pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Contingencies </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">We have in the past, and may in the future, receive notices from third parties that claim our products infringe their intellectual property rights. We cannot be certain that our technologies and products do not and will not infringe issued patents or other proprietary rights of third parties. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Any infringement claims, with or without merit, could result in significant litigation costs and diversion of management and financial resources, including the payment of damages, which could have a material adverse effect on our business, financial condition, and results of operations. </p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">14</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000339" name="us-gaap:DebtDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000817720_20190701_20191231" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000339_dcnt_b6494868-da5c-4e25-ae2b-6c2bf938c209">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">11. Debt </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Convertible Debt</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Our convertible debt consists of an original $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000557" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentFaceAmount" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-6" scale="6">525</ix:nonFraction> million aggregate principal amount of 0.50% convertible senior notes due 2022, or the Notes, which were issued in a private placement transaction. The net proceeds from the Notes, after deducting discounts, were $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000558" name="syna:ProceedsFromIssuanceOfConvertibleDebt" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">514.5</ix:nonFraction> million.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;color:#252525;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Notes bear interest at a rate of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000559" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercentage" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="4" scale="-2">0.50</ix:nonFraction>% per year, which is payable semi-annually in arrears, on June&#160;15 and December&#160;15 of each year. The Notes are senior unsecured obligations and rank senior in right of payment to any of our indebtedness that is expressly subordinated in right of payment to the Notes&#59; equal in right of payment to any our liabilities that are not so subordinated&#59; effectively junior in right of payment to any of our secured indebtedness to the extent of the value of the assets securing such indebtedness&#59; and structurally junior to all indebtedness and other liabilities (including trade payables) of our subsidiaries.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;color:#252525;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Notes mature on <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000560" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentMaturityDate" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt:datemonthdayyearen">June&#160;15, 2022</ix:nonNumeric>, or the Maturity Date, unless earlier repurchased, redeemed or converted.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;color:#252525;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Holders may convert all or any portion of their Notes, in multiples of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000561" name="syna:ConvertibleDebtPrincipalAmountInMultiples" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="0" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">1,000</ix:nonFraction> principal amounts, at their option at any time prior to the close of business on the business day immediately preceding March&#160;15, 2022 under certain defined circumstances. </p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On or after March&#160;15, 2022 until the close of business on the business day immediately preceding the Maturity Date, holders may convert all or any portion of their Notes, in multiples of $1,000 principal amounts, at the option of the holder. Upon conversion, we will pay or deliver, at our election, shares of common stock, cash, or a combination of cash and shares of common stock.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The<span style="color:#252525;"> conversion rate for the Notes is initially <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000562" name="syna:DebtInstrumentConvertibleNumberOfSharesPerThousandOfPrincipalAmountOfNotes" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="4">13.6947</ix:nonFraction> shares of common stock per $1,000 principal amount of Notes (equivalent to an initial conversion price of approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD_xbrlishares" id="F_000563" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPrice1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="2">73.02</ix:nonFraction> per share of common stock). The conversion rate is subject to adjustment in certain circumstances.</span></p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;color:#252525;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Upon the occurrence of a fundamental change (as defined in the Notes indenture), holders of the Notes may require us to repurchase for cash all or a portion of their Notes at a fundamental change repurchase price equal to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000564" name="syna:PercentageOfPrincipalAmountOfNotesEqualToRepurchasePrice" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="2" scale="-2">100</ix:nonFraction>% of the principal amount of the Notes to be repurchased, plus accrued and unpaid interest up to, but excluding, the fundamental change repurchase date.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">We<span style="color:#252525;"> may not redeem the Notes prior to June 20, 2020. We may redeem for cash all or any portion of the Notes, at our option, on or after June 20, 2020, if the last reported sale price of our common stock, as determined by us, has been at least <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000565" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdPercentageOfStockPriceTrigger" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="2" scale="-2">130</ix:nonFraction>% of the conversion price then in effect for at least <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_synaDay" id="F_000566" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdTradingDays" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF">20</ix:nonFraction> trading days (whether or not consecutive) during any <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_synaDay" id="F_000567" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentConvertibleThresholdConsecutiveTradingDays1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF">30</ix:nonFraction> consecutive trading day period (including the last trading day of such period) ending on, and including, the trading day immediately preceding the date on which we provide notice of redemption at a redemption price equal to 100% of the principal amount of the Notes to be redeemed, plus accrued and unpaid interest up to, but excluding, the redemption date. Our policy is to settle the principal amount of our Notes with cash upon conversion or redemption.</span></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;color:#252525;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">As of the issuance date of the Notes, we recorded $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000568" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentConvertibleCarryingAmountOfTheEquityComponent" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">82.1</ix:nonFraction> million of the principal amount to equity, representing the debt discount for the difference between our estimated nonconvertible debt borrowing rate of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000569" name="syna:NonconvertibleDebtBorrowingRate" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="4" scale="-2">4.39</ix:nonFraction>% and the coupon rate of the Notes of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000570" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercentage" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="4" scale="-2">0.50</ix:nonFraction>% using a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000571">five-year</span> life, which coincides with the term of the Notes. In addition, we allocated the total of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000572" name="us-gaap:DeferredFinanceCostsGross" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">11.1</ix:nonFraction> million of debt issuance costs, consisting of the initial purchaser&#8217;s discount of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000573" name="syna:DebtInstrumentInitialPurchasersDiscount" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">10.5</ix:nonFraction> million and legal, accounting, and printing costs of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000574" name="syna:DebtInstrumentLegalAccountingAndPrintingCosts" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="0" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">579,000</ix:nonFraction>, pro rata, to the equity and debt components of the Notes, or $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000575" name="syna:ConvertibleDebtIssuanceCostsProRataToEquityComponents" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">1.9</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000576" name="syna:ConvertibleDebtIssuanceCostsProRataToDebtComponents" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">9.2</ix:nonFraction> million, respectively. The debt discount and the debt issuance costs allocated to the debt component of the Notes are amortized as interest expense using the effective interest method over <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000577" name="syna:DebtInstrumentAmortizationPeriod" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:durwordsen">five years</ix:nonNumeric>.</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000363" name="syna:ScheduleOfContractualInterestExpenseAndAmortizationOfDiscountOnNotesTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000817720_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;color:#252525;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The contractual interest expense and amortization of discount on the Notes for the six months ended December 31, 2019, were as follows (in millions):</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Arial;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:19.52%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.88%;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:18.52%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:18.52%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">15</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000339_dcnt_b6494868-da5c-4e25-ae2b-6c2bf938c209">
<p style="margin-top:2pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The unamortized amounts of the debt issuance costs and discount associated with the Notes as of December 31, 2019, were $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000581" name="us-gaap:DeferredFinanceCostsNet" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">4.8</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000582" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaZeroPointFiveZeroPercentConvertibleSeniorNotesDueTwoThousandTwentyTwoMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">42.8</ix:nonFraction> million, respectively. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:8pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Revolving Credit Facility</p>
<p style="margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In September 2017, we entered into an Amendment and Restatement Agreement, or the Agreement, with the lenders that are party thereto, or the Lenders, and Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, as administrative agent for the Lenders. The Agreement terminated our prior term loan arrangement and provides for a revolving credit facility in a principal amount of up to $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000583" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20170930" decimals="INF" scale="6">200</ix:nonFraction> million, which includes a $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000584" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapLetterOfCreditMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20170930" decimals="INF" scale="6">20</ix:nonFraction> million sublimit for letters of credit and a $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000585" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapacity" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapBridgeLoanMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20170930" decimals="INF" scale="6">20</ix:nonFraction> million sublimit for swingline loans. Under the terms of the Agreement, we may, subject to the satisfaction of certain conditions, request increases in the revolving credit facility commitments in an aggregate principal amount of up to $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000586" name="syna:LineOfCreditFacilityAllowableRequestsForAdditionalBorrowing" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20170930" decimals="-6" scale="6">100</ix:nonFraction> million to the extent existing or new lenders agree to provide such increased or additional commitments, as applicable.&#160;&#160;Proceeds under the revolving credit facility are available for working capital and general corporate purposes. As of December 31, 2019, there was <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000587" name="us-gaap:LineOfCredit" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction> balance outstanding under the revolving credit facility. </p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000589" name="syna:LineOfCreditFacilityRepaymentDateDescription" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231">The revolving credit facility is required to be repaid in full on the earlier of (i) <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000588" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityExpirationDate1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt:datemonthdayyearen">September 27, 2022</ix:nonNumeric>, and (ii) the date 91 days prior to the Maturity Date of the Notes if the Notes have not been refinanced in full by such date.</ix:nonNumeric> Debt issuance costs of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000590" name="us-gaap:PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">2.3</ix:nonFraction> million relating to the revolving credit facility will be amortized over <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000591" name="syna:DebtInstrumentAmortizationPeriod" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:durmonth">60</ix:nonNumeric> months.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Our obligations under the Agreement are guaranteed by the material domestic subsidiaries of our Company, subject to certain exceptions (such material subsidiaries, together with our Company, collectively, the Credit Parties). The obligations of the Credit Parties under the Agreement and the other loan documents delivered in connection therewith are secured by a first priority security interest in substantially all of the existing and future personal property of the Credit Parties, including, without limitation, <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000592" name="syna:PercentageOfVotingCapitalStockOfCertainForeignSubsidiariesCollateralized" contextRef="C_0000817720_20190701_20191231" decimals="2" scale="-2">65</ix:nonFraction>% of the voting capital stock of certain of the Credit Parties&#8217; direct foreign subsidiaries, subject to certain exceptions. </p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000593" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentDescriptionOfVariableRateBasis" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231">The revolving credit facility bears interest at our election of a Base Rate plus an Applicable Margin or LIBOR plus an Applicable Margin. Swingline loans bear interest at a Base Rate plus an Applicable Margin. The Base Rate is a floating rate that is the greater of the Prime Rate, the Federal Funds Rate plus <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000594" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_us-gaapVariableRateAxis_us-gaapFederalFundsEffectiveSwapRateMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="4" scale="-4">50</ix:nonFraction> basis points, or LIBOR plus <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000595" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_us-gaapVariableRateAxis_us-gaapLondonInterbankOfferedRateLIBORMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="4" scale="-4">100</ix:nonFraction> basis points. The Applicable Margin is based on a sliding scale which ranges from <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000596" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_us-gaapVariableRateAxis_us-gaapBaseRateMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-4">0.25</ix:nonFraction> to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000597" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_us-gaapVariableRateAxis_us-gaapBaseRateMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-4">100</ix:nonFraction> basis points for Base Rate loans and <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000598" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_us-gaapVariableRateAxis_us-gaapLondonInterbankOfferedRateLIBORMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-4">100</ix:nonFraction> basis points to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000599" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_us-gaapVariableRateAxis_us-gaapLondonInterbankOfferedRateLIBORMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-4">175</ix:nonFraction> basis points for LIBOR loans.</ix:nonNumeric> We are required to pay a commitment fee on any unused commitments under the Agreement which is determined on a leverage-based sliding scale ranging from <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000600" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityUnusedCapacityCommitmentFeePercentage" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">0.175</ix:nonFraction>% to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000601" name="us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityUnusedCapacityCommitmentFeePercentage" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">0.25</ix:nonFraction>% per annum. Interest and fees are payable on a quarterly basis. The LIBOR index is expected to be discontinued at the end of 2021. Under our credit facility, when the LIBOR index is discontinued, we will switch to a comparable or successor rate as approved by the Administrative Agent, which is currently anticipated to be the Secured Overnight Financing Rate, or SOFR.</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000602" name="us-gaap:DebtInstrumentCovenantDescription" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231">Under the Agreement, there are various restrictive covenants, including three financial covenants which limit the consolidated total leverage ratio, or leverage ratio, the consolidated interest coverage ratio, or interest coverage ratio, a restriction which places a limit on the amount of capital expenditures that may be made in any fiscal year, a restriction that permits up to $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000603" name="syna:MaximumAccountsReceivableFinancings" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="6">50</ix:nonFraction> million per fiscal quarter of accounts receivable financings, and sets the Specified Leverage Ratio. The leverage ratio is the ratio of debt as of the measurement date to earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization, or EBITDA, for the four consecutive quarters ending with the quarter of measurement. The current leverage ratio shall not exceed <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000604" name="syna:MaximumPermittedLeverageRatio" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">3.50</ix:nonFraction> to 1.00 provided that for the four fiscal quarters ending after the date of a material acquisition, such maximum leverage ratio shall be adjusted to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000605" name="syna:MaximumPermittedLeverageRatio" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtStatementScenarioAxis_synaForFourFiscalQuartersEndingAfterDateOfMaterialAcquisitionMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">3.75</ix:nonFraction> to 1.00, and thereafter, shall not be more than <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000606" name="syna:MaximumPermittedLeverageRatio" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtStatementScenarioAxis_synaThereafterMember_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">3.50</ix:nonFraction> to 1.00. The interest coverage ratio is EBITDA to interest expense for the four consecutive quarters ending with the quarter of measurement. The interest coverage ratio must not be less than <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000607" name="syna:MinimumInterestCoverageRatio" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">3.50</ix:nonFraction> to 1.0 during the term of the Agreement. The Specified Leverage Ratio is the ratio used in determining, among other things, whether we are permitted to make dividends and/or prepay certain indebtedness, at a fixed ratio of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000608" name="syna:FixedCoverageRatio" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapCreditFacilityAxis_us-gaapRevolvingCreditFacilityMember_us-gaapDebtInstrumentAxis_synaAmendmentAndRestatementAgreementMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">3.00</ix:nonFraction> to 1.00. As of the end of the fiscal quarter, we were in compliance with the restrictive covenants</ix:nonNumeric>.</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000631" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPhantomShareUnitsPSUsMember_us-gaapIncomeStatementLocationAxis_us-gaapSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpensesMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">0.4</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:79.32%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:13.7pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Total</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1.92%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:16.74%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000632" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPhantomShareUnitsPSUsMember_20191001_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">3.0</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
</tr>
</table></div></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Historically, we have issued new shares in connection with our equity-settled share-based compensation plans, however, treasury shares are also available for issuance. Any additional shares repurchased under our common stock repurchase program will be available for issuance under our share-based compensation plans. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:18pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">New Share-Based Compensation Plans</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On October 29, 2019, our stockholders approved: (i)<span style="font-style:italic;"> </span>our 2019 Equity and Incentive Compensation Plan, or the 2019 Incentive Plan, to replace our Amended and Restated 2010 Incentive Compensation Plan, and (ii)<span style="font-style:italic;"> </span>our 2019 Employee Stock Purchase Plan, or the 2019 ESPP, to replace our Amended and Restated 2010 Employee Stock Purchase Plan. Upon approval of the 2019 Incentive Plan, new awards are no longer issued under the replaced share-based compensation plan. Awards outstanding at October 29, 2019 under our prior share-based compensation plans were not impacted by the approval of the 2019 Incentive Plan and continue to remain outstanding by their terms under the applicable share-based compensation plan. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The 2019 Incentive Plan authorizes our board of directors to provide equity-based compensation in the form of stock options, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock, restricted stock units, cash incentive awards, performance shares, performance units, and other stock-based awards.&#160;&#160;The number of shares approved by stockholders under the 2019 Incentive Plan was <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000633" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardNumberOfSharesAuthorized" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaTwoThousandNineteenEquityAndIncentiveCompensationPlanMember_20191029" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">1,230,000</ix:nonFraction>. The 2019 ESPP authorizes the company to provide eligible employees with an opportunity to acquire an equity interest in the company through the purchase of stock at a discount, with an initial authorization of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000634" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardNumberOfAdditionalSharesAuthorized" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_synaEmployeeStockPurchasePlanMember_20191028_20191029" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">1,500,000</ix:nonFraction> shares.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Effective August 19, 2019, we adopted the 2019 Inducement Equity Plan. <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000635" name="us-gaap:CommonStockCapitalSharesReservedForFutureIssuance" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaTwoThousandNineteenInducementEquityPlanMember_20190819" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">650,000</ix:nonFraction> shares of our common stock have been reserved for issuance under the 2019 Inducement Equity Plan, subject to adjustment for stock dividends, stock splits, or other changes in our common stock or capital structure. The 2019 Inducement Equity Plan is intended to comply with Rule 5635(c)(4) of the Nasdaq Stock Market Listing Rules, which provide an exception to the Nasdaq Stock Market Listing Rules&#8217; on the shareholder approval requirement for the issuance of securities with regards to grants to employees of the Company or its subsidiaries as an inducement material to such individuals entering into employment with the Company or its subsidiaries. An individual is eligible to receive an award under the 2019 Inducement Equity Plan only if he or she was not previously an employee or director of our company (or is returning to work after a bona-fide period of non-employment), and an award under the 2019 Inducement Equity Plan is a material inducement for him or her to accept employment with our company.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">17</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1.62%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt transparent;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1.62%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.88%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000653" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsNonvestedNumber" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaDeferredStockUnitsMember_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">1,474,123</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.88%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000654" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsAggregateIntrinsicValueOutstanding" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaDeferredStockUnitsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">98.6</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

</table></div></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The aggregate intrinsic value was determined using the closing price of our common stock on December 27, 2019 of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD_xbrlishares" id="F_000655" name="syna:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardIntrinsicValueClosingPrice" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaDeferredStockUnitsMember_20191227" decimals="INF">66.89</ix:nonFraction>. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Of the shares delivered, <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000656" name="us-gaap:SharesPaidForTaxWithholdingForShareBasedCompensation" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaDeferredStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">184,466</ix:nonFraction> shares valued at $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000657" name="us-gaap:AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareBasedCompensation" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaDeferredStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">7.4</ix:nonFraction> million were withheld to meet statutory tax withholding requirements. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:18pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Market Stock Units </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Our 2019 Incentive Plan and our Amended and Restated 2010 Incentive Compensation Plans provide for the grant of MSU awards to our employees, consultants, and directors, and our 2019 Inducement Equity Plan provides for the grant of MSU awards to certain of our employees. An MSU is a promise to deliver shares of our common stock at a future date based on the achievement of market-based performance requirements in accordance with the terms of the MSU grant agreement. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">We have granted MSUs to our executive officers and other management members under our Amended and Restated 2010 Incentive Compensation Plan, our 2019 Incentive Plan and our 2019 Inducement Equity Plan, which are designed to vest in three or four tranches with the target quantity for each tranche equal to <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000662_2"><span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000663_2"><span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000664_2">one-third</span></span></span> or <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000665_2">one-fourth</span> of the total MSU grant. The first tranche vests based on a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000658">one-year</span> performance period&#59; the second tranche vests based on a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000659">two-year</span> performance period&#59; the third tranche vests based on a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000660">three-year</span> performance period&#59; and the fourth tranche (in the case of <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000661">four-year</span> vesting) vests based on a four-year performance period. Performance is measured based on the achievement of a specified level of total stockholder return, or TSR, relative to the TSR of the S&#38;P Semiconductor Select Industry Index, or SPSISC Index, for grants made beginning in fiscal 2018, and relative to the Philadelphia Semiconductor Index, or SOX Index, for grants made prior to fiscal 2018. The potential payout ranges from <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000666" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">0</ix:nonFraction>% to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000667" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">200</ix:nonFraction>% of the target grant quantity and is adjusted on a <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000668_2">two</span>-to-one ratio based on our TSR performance relative to the SPSISC Index TSR or SOX Index TSR using the following formula: </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(100% + ([Synaptics TSR &#8212; {SPSISC Index TSR or SOX Index TSR}] x 2)) </p></ix:continuation>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">18</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000340_dcnt_76f71a42-766a-435b-8c08-5e3a2def50b9" continuedAt="F_000340_dcnt_afbd92ff-4503-4e3f-ad7e-c967d5268779">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">For MSUs vesting over three years, the payout for the first tranche and the second tranche will not exceed <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000669" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_synaThreeYearPerformanceMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_us-gaapShareBasedCompensationAwardTrancheOneMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000670" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_synaThreeYearPerformanceMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_us-gaapShareBasedCompensationAwardTrancheTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">100</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction>% and the payout for the third tranche will be calculated based on the total target quantity for the entire grant multiplied by the payout factor, based on performance for the three-year performance period, less shares issued for the first tranche and the second tranche. For MSUs vesting over four years, the payout for the first tranche, the second tranche and the third tranche will not exceed <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000671" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_synaFourYearPerformanceMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_us-gaapShareBasedCompensationAwardTrancheOneMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000672" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_synaFourYearPerformanceMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_us-gaapShareBasedCompensationAwardTrancheTwoMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000673" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_us-gaapPlanNameAxis_synaFourYearPerformanceMember_us-gaapVestingAxis_us-gaapShareBasedCompensationAwardTrancheThreeMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">100</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction>% and the payout for the fourth tranche will be calculated based on the total target quantity for the entire grant multiplied by the payout factor, based on performance for the four-year performance period, less shares issued for the first tranche, the second tranche and the third tranche.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Delivery of shares earned, if any, will take place on the dates provided in the applicable MSU grant agreement, assuming the grantee is still an employee, consultant, or director of our company at the end of the applicable performance period. On the delivery date, we withhold shares to cover statutory tax withholding requirements and deliver a net quantity of shares to the employee, consultant, or director after such withholding. Until delivery of shares, the grantee has no rights as a stockholder with respect to any shares underlying the MSU award. </p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000368" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfShareBasedCompensationActivityTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">MSU activity was as follows: </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.88%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000679" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsNonvestedNumber" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20191231" decimals="INF" format="ixt:numdotdecimal">402,832</ix:nonFraction></p></td>

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.88%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000680" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsAggregateIntrinsicValueOutstanding" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">26.9</ix:nonFraction></p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt transparent;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

</table></div></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The aggregate intrinsic value was determined using the closing price of our common stock on December 27, 2019 of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD_xbrlishares" id="F_000681" name="syna:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardIntrinsicValueClosingPrice" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20191227" decimals="INF">66.89</ix:nonFraction>.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">We value MSUs using the Monte Carlo simulation model on the date of grant and amortize the compensation expense over the three- or four-year performance and service period on a straight-line basis. The unrecognized share-based compensation cost of our outstanding MSUs was approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000682" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedShareBasedAwardsOtherThanOptions" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">19.4</ix:nonFraction> million as of December 31, 2019, which will be recognized over a weighted average period of approximately <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000683" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedPeriodForRecognition1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaMarketStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:duryear">1.8</ix:nonNumeric> years. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:18pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Performance Stock Units </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Our 2019 Incentive Plan and our Amended and Restated 2010 Incentive Compensation Plan provide for the grant of PSU awards to our employees, consultants, and directors. A PSU is a promise to deliver shares of our common stock at a future date based on the achievement of performance-based requirements in accordance with the terms of the PSU grant agreement. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">We have granted PSUs to our executive officers and other management members under our Amended and Restated 2010 Incentive Compensation Plan, our 2019 Incentive Plan and our 2019 Inducement Equity Plan, which are designed to vest in three tranches with the target quantity for each tranche equal to <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000685_2">one-third</span> of the total PSU grant. The grants have a specific one-year performance period and vesting occurs over three service periods with the final service period ending approximately <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000684" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingPeriod1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:durwordsen">three years</ix:nonNumeric> from the grant date. Performance is measured based on the achievement of a specified level of non-GAAP earnings per share. The potential payout ranges from <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000686" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">0</ix:nonFraction>% to <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000687" name="syna:PercentageOfPotentialPayout" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">200</ix:nonFraction>% of the target grant quantity and is adjusted on a linear basis with a payout triggering if our non-GAAP earnings per share equals greater than <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000688" name="syna:ThresholdPercentageOfEarningsPerShareToTriggerPayOut" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">65</ix:nonFraction>% of the target with a maximum payout achieved at <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000689" name="syna:ThresholdPercentageOfEarningsPerShareToTriggerPayOut" contextRef="C_0000817720_srtRangeAxis_srtMaximumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" decimals="INF" scale="-2">135</ix:nonFraction>% of target. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Delivery of shares earned, if any, will take place on the dates provided in the applicable PSU grant agreement, assuming the grantee is still an employee, consultant, or director of our company at the end of the applicable service period. On the delivery date, we withhold shares to cover statutory tax withholding requirements and deliver a net quantity of shares to the employee, consultant, or director after such withholding. Until delivery of shares, the grantee has no rights as a stockholder with respect to any shares underlying the PSU award.</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">19</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">PSU activity was as follows: </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.88%; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000696" name="us-gaap:SharebasedCompensationArrangementBySharebasedPaymentAwardEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOptionsAggregateIntrinsicValueOutstanding" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">25.3</ix:nonFraction></p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

</table></div></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The aggregate intrinsic value was determined using the closing price of our common stock on December 27, 2019 of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD_xbrlishares" id="F_000697" name="syna:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardIntrinsicValueClosingPrice" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20191227" decimals="INF">66.89</ix:nonFraction>. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">We value PSUs using the aggregate intrinsic value on the date of grant adjusted for estimated performance achievement during the performance period and amortize the compensation expense over the <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000698">three-year</span> service period on a ratable basis. The unrecognized share-based compensation cost of our outstanding PSUs was approximately $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000699" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedShareBasedAwardsOtherThanOptions" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">21.0</ix:nonFraction> million as of December 31, 2019, which will be recognized over a weighted average period of approximately <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000700" name="us-gaap:EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNonvestedAwardsTotalCompensationCostNotYetRecognizedPeriodForRecognition1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_synaPerformanceStockUnitsMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:duryear">1.7</ix:nonNumeric> years.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:18pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Phantom Stock Units </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:6pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;" id="keyword">The 2019 Incentive Plan authorizes the grant of phantom stock units to non-employee directors, officers and employees. We initially granted phantom stock units in October 2019.&#160;&#160;Phantom stock units are cash-settled and entitle the recipient to receive a cash payment equal to the value of a single share for each unit based on the average closing share price of our stock over the thirty calendar days prior to the vesting date. Grants of phantom stock units vest over <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000701" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardAwardVestingPeriod1" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPhantomShareUnitsPSUsMember_20190701_20191231" format="ixt-sec:durwordsen">three years</ix:nonNumeric>, with an annual vesting date of October 31 each year subsequent to the grant date. We recognize compensation expense for phantom stock units on a straight-line basis for each tranche of each award based on the average closing price of our common stock over the thirty calendar days ended prior to each balance sheet date.&#160;&#160;The outstanding phantom stock units had a fair value of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD_xbrlishares" id="F_000702" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsOutstandingWeightedAverageExercisePrice" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPhantomShareUnitsPSUsMember_20191231" decimals="2">62.02</ix:nonFraction> per unit at December 31, 2019 and our accrued liability for such units was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000703" name="us-gaap:AccruedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNoncurrent" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPhantomShareUnitsPSUsMember_20191231" decimals="-5" scale="6">3.0</ix:nonFraction> million.</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000370" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfShareBasedCompensationActivityTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000817720_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPhantomShareUnitsPSUsMember_20190701_20191231" escape="true">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-indent:4.54%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Phantom stock activity was as follows: </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
